meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Jake Harlee Paula Weissman Mary Hammond Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #566.

td.p: Jake Harlee, a law student from La Palma, California
Paula Weissman, a social worker from St. Louis, Missouri
Mary Hammond, a homemaker originally from Kansas City, Missouri (whose 1-day cash winnings total $9,000)

tr.td: ANIMALS
CORPORATE AMERICA
MOVIE TRIVIA
GEOGRAPHY
COUNTRY MUSIC
"ONE, TWO, THREE"
(Alex: Possibly 1, 2, or all 3 will appear in the response.)

tr.td: It gets its name because it looks like it's praying when it's actually preying
